Text: Thanks a lot!! Was overviewing my vinyl collection the other day and thought that i should get this masterpiece in mp3, and here it is!
Awesome! But could someone reseed? I'm stuck at 55%. Thanks!
best thrash album ever. from start to finish, just awesome. cheers dude. i used to have the cassette!
Great Torrent, thank you. Will seed!

Ooh.... what a glorious music i'm listening right now....... ah...... OW! OWWWWWWWWWWWW! what the fuck!!....blood?....slimy-yellowish-popcorns with blood?...OWWW FUCK!!......is that my brains on the fucking ceiling?, just kidding. But why dont you ppl try this album yourself, its INSANELY AMAZING.
People do yourselves a favor and get the ORIGINAL version of this album. Skip this shitty remaster. The original has only 9 tracks so look for that version.
